List

Utilities for controlling the style/position of bullets/numbers in lists.

List Style Type

List disc type & inside type

  • Now this is a story all about how, my life got flipped turned upside down
  • And I like to take a minute and sit right here
  • I'll tell you how I became the prince of a town called Bel-Air

List decimal & inside type

  • Now this is a story all about how, my life got flipped turned upside down
  • And I like to take a minute and sit right here
  • I'll tell you how I became the prince of a town called Bel-Air

List none type & inside type

  • Now this is a story all about how, my life got flipped turned upside down
  • And I like to take a minute and sit right here
  • I'll tell you how I became the prince of a town called Bel-Air

List disc type & outside type

  • And I like to take a minute and sit right here
  • I'll tell you how I became the prince of a town called Bel-Air
